amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part D of House Report 117-241 to require that the Department of State to provide an annual briefing to Congress on China's progress and efforts to meet emission goals and commitments.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Department of State to provide an annual briefing to Congress on China's progress and efforts to meet emission goals and commitments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 264 - 163 (Roll no. 23).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Crenshaw.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 264 - 163 (Roll no. 23).
